Crafting Components: Ember from the Elemental Plane of Fire

Requires attunement by a spellcaster

While holding this wand, you can use an action to expend 1 or more charges to cast @Compendium[a5e.a5e-spells.47oifxu4ytkf7alt]{Fireball} (save DC 15). For 1 charge, you cast the spellâ€™s 3rd-level version. Increase the spell slot level by one for each additional expended charge.

This wand has 7 charges and regains [[/r 1d6+1 #charges]] expended charges each dawn. When the last charge is expended, roll a [[/r 1d20]]. On a 1, the wand disappears in a flash of fire and smoke.
